alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Hardin (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 12:38PM CST until February 06 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown, J.T. Myers Dam and Mount Vernon. .Above normal rainfall this month will continue to cause significant rises on the Ohio River. The river at Mount Vernon, J. T. Myers and Shawneetown will rise above flood stage late Tuesday night into Wednesday morning, and will continue to rise through next weekend. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pah. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 06... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to Tuesday, February 06. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 25.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday evening to a crest of 36.3 feet Saturday, February 03. It will then fall below flood stage Monday, February 05. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
